name: Everyday Exploration Boxer Brief Boxed - Men's

features: Made with a hemp blend to create a more environmentally-conscious fabric
Double front panel designed to provide extra support
Wide elastic waistband designed for maximum comfort
Flatlock seam construction designed to minimize chafing
Material Content: 108 Deep Navy Heather: 53% Merino Wool, 39% Polyester, 8% Hemp. D82 Black Stripe: 54% Merino Wool, 41% Polyester, 5% Hemp. Exclusive of Decoration
